Package CSTutor.Model.Tutorial

Handles aspects of all tutorial components, including subpackages for the tutorial and the editor.

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    CodeExample
    The code example is for the author to show how the topic is used.
    Description
    The description is intended for the author to include any background information about the topic at hand.
    EditTextButtons
    EditTextButtons comprise the toolbar that gives the authors or editors the ability to format text within any of the text input fields.
    RoadmapModule
    The Roadmap Module is the bar on the left side of the student's tutorial that allows them to quickly navigate sections of the tutorial track.
    TutorialEditor
    An Author page is an individual topic page within a tutorial track.
    TutorialPage
    A Student page is an individual topic page within a tutorial track.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    EditTextButtons.FontColor
    Allows the font colors to be more easily distinguished

Package CSTutor.Model.Tutorial Description

Handles aspects of all tutorial components, including subpackages for the tutorial and the editor.
